      • setBackgroundColor

        public Stripe3ds2ButtonCustomization.Builder setBackgroundColor(java.lang.String hexColor)

        Set the button's background color

        Parameters:
        hexColor - The button's background color in the format #RRGGBB or #AARRGGBB
        Throws:
        - If the color cannot be parsed

      • setCornerRadius

        public Stripe3ds2ButtonCustomization.Builder setCornerRadius(int cornerRadius)

        Set the corner radius of the button

        Parameters:
        cornerRadius - The radius of the button in pixels
        Throws:
        - If the corner radius is less than 0

      • setTextFontName

        public Stripe3ds2ButtonCustomization.Builder setTextFontName(java.lang.String fontName)

        Set the button's text font

        Parameters:
        fontName - The name of the font. If not found, default system font used
        Throws:
        - If font name is null or empty

      • setTextColor

        public Stripe3ds2ButtonCustomization.Builder setTextColor(java.lang.String hexColor)

        Set the button's text color

        Parameters:
        hexColor - The button's text color in the format #RRGGBB or #AARRGGBB
        Throws:
        - If the color cannot be parsed

      • setTextFontSize

        public Stripe3ds2ButtonCustomization.Builder setTextFontSize(int fontSize)

        Set the button's text size

        Parameters:
        fontSize - The size of the font in scaled-pixels (sp)
        Throws:
        - If the font size is 0 or less

      • build

        public PaymentAuthConfig.Stripe3ds2ButtonCustomization build()

        Build the button customization

        Returns:
        The built button customization
